error.message: Class Drupal\Tests\sfc\Unit\RefreshComponentAssetsCommandTest was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Call to deprecated function file_scan_directory(). Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\File\FileSystemInterface::scanDirectory() instead.
Class Drupal\sfc\TwigComponentLoader implements deprecated interface Twig\Loader\ExistsLoaderInterface: since 1.12 (to be removed in 3.0)
Class Drupal\sfc\Plugin\Block\InvalidBlock was not found while trying to analyse it - autoloading is probably not configured properly.
Call to deprecated method getSource() of class Drupal\sfc\TwigComponentLoader: since 1.27 (to be removed in 2.0), implement Twig\Loader\SourceContextLoaderInterface
Call to deprecated method getSource() of class Drupal\sfc\TwigComponentLoader: since 1.27 (to be removed in 2.0), implement Twig\Loader\SourceContextLoaderInterface
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to sfc.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
